title: Game freezing ever since patch 6.22
body: Ever since I installed patch 6.22 my game will freeze randomly during the game. Does anyone know why this could be happening?

replies.body: Are you using Windows 10?  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing problems for that player.  If so, disabling the bar should fix this up.  I also recommend disabling any third party add-ons you might be using like play.tv and overlays, as that can cause similar problems.  Let me know if that helps!
Running on Windows 8 with no third party add-ons.

Thanks for the update!  You may be having some driver issues then that's causing problems with rendering the game.  Check out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC and resolve the freezing.  Hope that helps.  :D

That's a bummer to hear, but thanks for trying.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help.  Attach some logs as well that can be provided by the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll respond back asap.
